message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. While I cannot disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm offering it to you exclusively at a price of $1500000. This represents a significant opportunity for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know.  Otherwise, I'll be moving on to other potential buyers.
